snippet.title: Trailer KOKODI Mask
snippet.description:
In the world of Kokodi, you should always wear a mask when venturing into dangerous places.

It will not only shield you from hit to the head. With the infusion of qualia (a mystical substance) and the inscribing of runes - it will get new properties and make mask more valuable.

The mask will give you special abilities and protect you from monsters and demons.
Should you find yourself without a spare mask or if your current one is destroyed, you become a magnet to all nearby NPCs.

REMEMBER: always wear your mask!
